data.text: @akilbello @alexanderrusso Yah, as a teacher having 25% of your students miss a week or more of school is total hell. The countless hours tracking each student down, trying to get them caught up, etc. that’s a total nightmare as a teacher, I don’t know why you’re downplaying this. So exhausting
